text: 1600 Penn is an American sitcom created by Josh Gad and former Barack Obama speechwriter, Jon Lovett for the NBC television network.https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/style/nbc-orders-pilot- for-1600-penn-with-former-obama-speechwriter-as- producer/2011/10/24/gIQAkd0hDM_story.html == Plot == It shows a family and about their life in the White House. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:American sitcoms Category:NBC network series Category:English- language television programs
title: 1600 Penn
